body.header: Look at the advice below about not knowing what to say and then watch the video.
body.section:
StrategiesThere are always other ways to say things!
Don't panic if you can't remember a word, or if you feel you are stuck for words.
Remember the following expressions:
"I'm not sure what it's called, but it is/looks like/is used for …""I've forgotten what it is in English, but …""It's similar to …, but I don't remember the word."
We all forget words sometimes. It happens in natural conversations. Don't let it bother you!
